document_data.name: Grunfesting
document_data.socrefs: {{Cite web enhancement/Dungeon 133 Map and Handout Supplement|26}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Grunfesting''' (meaning "'''Green Fortress'''" in the [[Giant language]]) was an ancient [[giant]]-ruled kingdom in [[Faerûn]] during the [[Time of Giants]] of the [[Dawn Age]] ({{Yearlink|-30000}} to {{Yearlink|-24000}}).
document_data.Geography:
{{Canon|adap}}
The [[Skull Gorge]] was one of the many areas of land that the kingdom encompassed. Those that lived in the gorge were ruled over by a lord in the city of [[Kongen-Thulnir]].
document_data.History:
Grunfesting was one of the giant kingdoms that warred with the ancient [[dragon]] kingdoms during the Dawn Age.

Grunfesting managed to survive beyond the [[Thousand Year War]], but over time their kingdom's power gradually waned.
document_data.Inhabitants:
{{Canon|adap}}
[[Stone giant]]s were the predominant race in the kingdom of Grunfesting. In the years following the Thousand Year War, with their power waning its citizens in Skull Gorge allowed the primitive ancestors of [[human]]s to settle alongside them.
